scripts.dev: cmd /C "npx ts-node --transpileOnly ./sync.ts && set CIRCLE_NODE_TOTAL=1 && set DEVMODE=true && set NEXT_MANUAL_SIG_HANDLE=1 && next dev"
scripts.build: cmd /C "npx ts-node --transpileOnly ./sync.ts && set CIRCLE_NODE_TOTAL=1 && set ANALYZE=true && set DEVMODE=true && set BUILDMODE=true && set NEXT_MANUAL_SIG_HANDLE=1 && next build"
scripts.start: cmd /C "npx ts-node --transpileOnly ./sync.ts && set CIRCLE_NODE_TOTAL=1 && set DEVMODE=false && set STARTMODE=true && set NEXT_MANUAL_SIG_HANDLE=1 && next start"
scripts.buildlinux: CIRCLE_NODE_TOTAL=1 ANALYZE=true DEVMODE=true BUILDMODE=true NEXT_MANUAL_SIG_HANDLE=1 next build
scripts.startlinux: CIRCLE_NODE_TOTAL=1 DEVMODE=false STARTMODE=true NEXT_MANUAL_SIG_HANDLE=1 next start
